markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Mutant Gnoll Hulk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2411)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Separated from their pack during a prolonged storm of wild magic, the Mana Wastes mutant gnoll hulk transformed into a gigantic, ravenous creature.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ManaWastes_MutantGnollHulk.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Mutant Gnoll Hulk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2411)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Mutant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=229" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 333</row>

**Perception** +17; magic hunger (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [battle axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16)_, [Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 195

**Vengeful Bite** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature critically hits the mutant with a melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike or a non-[reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) melee Strike; **Effect** The mutant makes a maw Strike against the triggering creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_battle axe_ +22 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+12 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
maw +21 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+12 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +18 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+9 piercing

**Pack Attack**   A Mana Wastes mutant gnoll hulk deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature who's within reach of at least two of the Mana Wastes mutant gnoll hulk's allies.

**Rugged Travel**   A gnoll ignores the first square of difficult terrain it moves into each time it Steps or Strides.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-315" />
name: Mutant Gnoll Hulk

Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 26 Unspecific Lore : DC 24 Specific Lore : DC 21 Mutant Gnoll Hulk Source Impossible Lands pg. 333 Perception +17; magic hunger (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Common, Gnoll Skills Acrobatics +18, Athletics +21, Intimidation +16, Survival +15 Str +6 Dex +3 Con +4 Int +2 Wis +2 Cha +3 Items +1 striking battle axe , Composite Longbow (20 arrows), Leather Armor --- AC 26 Fort +21 Ref +18 Will +15 HP 195 Vengeful Bite Reaction Trigger A creature critically hits the mutant with a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike; Effect The mutant makes a maw Strike against the triggering creature. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action battle axe +22 (Magical, Sweep, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+12 slashing Melee Single Action maw +21 (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d12+12 piercing Ranged Single Action composite longbow +18 (deadly d10, volley 30 feet), Damage 1d8+9 piercing Pack Attack A Mana Wastes mutant gnoll hulk deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature who's within reach of at least two of the Mana Wastes mutant gnoll hulk's allies. Rugged Travel A gnoll ignores the first square of difficult terrain it moves into each time it Steps or Strides.
